home.title: Home | AirQo
home.description: Explore the air quality monitoring data and tools by AirQo.
home.keywords: air quality, pollution, monitoring, AirQo, environment
home.monitorDescription: We deploy a high-resolution air quality monitoring network in target urban areas across Africa to increase awareness and understanding of air quality management, provide actionable information, and derive actions against air pollution.
home.analyticsTitle: An interactive air quality analytics platform
home.analyticsDescription: Access and visualise real-time and historical air quality information across Africa through our easy-to-use air quality analytics dashboard.
home.apiTitle: Amplify air quality impact through our API
home.apiDescription: Are you a developer? We invite you to leverage our open-air quality data on your App
home.mapTitle: Live air quality insights across Africa
home.mapDescription: Visualize hourly air quality information with a single click, over our growing network across African cities
home.appDescription: Discover the quality of air you are breathing

playerSection.title: Clean air for all African cities
playerSection.quote: "9 out of 10 people breathe polluted air"
playerSection.description: We empower communities with accurate, hyperlocal and timely air quality data to drive air pollution mitigation actions.

communityChampion.title: I'm a Community Champion.
communityChampion.description: Interested in raising awareness about air pollution.

researcher.title: I'm a Researcher.
researcher.description: Interested in Air Quality data and analytics

developer.title: I'm a Developer.
developer.description: Interested in establishing an Air Quality Network, utilizing the AirQo API, or both.

header.description: Access real-time and historic air quality information across Africa through our easy-to-use air quality analytics dashboard.

research.title: For Research
research.description: Advancing knowledge and evidence on air quality issues

heading.title: Closing the air quality data gaps in Africa
heading.description: We provide accurate, hyperlocal, and timely air quality data to provide evidence of the magnitude and scale of air pollution across Africa.

highResolution.title: High Resolution Network
highResolution.content: We want cleaner air in all African cities. We leverage our understanding of the African context.

digitalPlatforms.title: Digital air quality platforms
digitalPlatforms.content: We empower decision-makers in African cities We increase access to air quality data evidence.

policyEngagement.title: Policy engagement
policyEngagement.content: We engage city authorities and government agencies We empower local leaders with air quality information.

champions.title: AirQommunity Champions
champions.content: A growing network of individual change makers Championing local leaders and demand action.

freeAccess.title: Free Access To Air Quality Information
freeAccess.content: We train individuals and communities Facilitating access to air quality information.

hosts.title: AirQo Hosts
hosts.content: We engage locals host our deployment activities We involve locals in our maintenance drives.

highlight.title: Google.org Leaders to Watch 2022
highlight.description: From expanding equity in education to addressing environmental issues, this year's Leaders to Watch are building a better future for everyone.
